title: Question about an icon on my client when I'm "assembling my party."
body: Theres an icon at the button at the bottom of the client that, when you hover over it with the mouse, it says "You're guaranteed one of your selected roles this game because you recently filled or played support." Aren't I always guaranteed one of my selected roles? Can anyone explain?

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, Autofill is a feature enabled during certain times when the queue times would be abnormally high. There are a few ways this system works, so I encourage you to read through our [last update post](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/ranked-updates-now-live) on this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
If auto filled is enabled due to high queue times then you can get a role you didn't select.
